Infinite Analytics is a Mumbai-based company whose proprietary AI platform finds rich insights about customers from unseen patterns in diverse datasets to drive intelligent segmentation and targeting. We use machine learning technologies to precisely find and acquire customers to deliver a two fold impact - increase conversions, while reducing acquisition cost. We have increased conversions by over 300%, while reducing cost by ~50% for our clients.*Founded* by MIT alums with a team from Harvard, Stanford and MIT
*Backed* by leading investors including Ratan Tata
*Advised* by Sir. Tim Berners Lee (founder of the World Wide Web), Deb Roy (Chief Media Scientist at Twitter), Erik Brynjolfsson (Director of the MIT Centre for Digital Business) and Rosemary Leith (Director of the World Wide Web Foundation, UK)
*Trusted* by brands such as  Coca Cola,  Discovery Communications, Marico, Kimberly Clark, Mahindra, NBA, Sunrise Telecom, B2W Digital to name a few.
name: Infinite Analytics India Private Limited
